fields.name: Yuriko the Tiger's Shadow
fields.oracle_txt: Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.)
